brief_title: Combivent® CFC Metered Dose Inhaler (MDI) in Moderate to Severe Asthma
brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to demonstrate the superior bronchodilator efficacy of inhaled Combivent® CFC MDI vs. Albuterol HFA MDI in moderate to severe asthma patients.
criteria: Inclusion Criteria: - Patient greater than or equal to 18 years of age, - non-smokers, - diagnosed with asthma, with an FEV1 less than or equal to 70 percent of predicted normal, - stable use of Beta agonist - daily use of inhaled steroids for one year Exclusion Criteria: - Patients with other significant diseases other than asthma, requiring oxygen, - intubated within 5 years, - asthma exacerbation within 6 weeks of trial, - use of unstable doses (greater than 10 mg/day of prednisone or equivalent) of steroids, - participating in another interventional trial
